DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy IMRT IMRT Credential Institution Ind-4
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator whether an institution administering an advanced form of 3-Dimensional Conformal Radiation Therapy is credentialed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy IMRT IMRT Credential Institution
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the credentials of an institution administration of an advanced form of 3-Dimensional Conformal Radiation Therapy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: An advanced form of 3-Dimensional Conformal Radiation Therapy:A document that qualifies somebody to do something, provides authentication for a claim, or confirms position or status.:An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research as, a literary institution; also, a building or the buildings occupied or used by such organization.

Concepts.definition: An advanced form of 3-Dimensional Conformal Radiation Therapy (3D CRT) that involves the use of varying intensities of small radiation beams to produce dosage distributions that are more precise than those possible with 3D CRT.
Records that qualify somebody to do something, provides authentication for a claim, or confirms position or status.

An established society, corporation, foundation or other organization founded and united for a specific purpose, e.g. for health-related research; also used to refer to a building or buildings occupied or used by such organization.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ReferenceDocuments.name: If IMRT is planned, has the t
ReferenceDocuments.description: If IMRT is planned, has the treating Institution been credentialed for IMRT by the Radiological Physics Center (RPC) at M.D. Anderson Cancer Center?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the treating Institution been credentialed for IMRT by the Radiological Physics Center (RPC) at M.D. Anderson Cancer Center?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has your participating location, hospital, or affiliate submitted documentation to the study team to determine whether the site is credentialed for IMRT to enter patients onto the study?
